verses.name: Nehemiah 8:10
verses.text: Then he said unto them, Go your way, eat the fat, and drink the sweet, and send portions unto them for whom nothing is prepared: for this day is holy unto our Lord: neither be ye sorry; for the joy of the Lord is your strength.

verses.name: Nehemiah 8:11
verses.text: So the Levites stilled all the people, saying, Hold your peace, for the day is holy; neither be ye grieved.

verses.name: Nehemiah 8:12
verses.text: And all the people went their way to eat, and to drink, and to send portions, and to make great mirth, because they had understood the words that were declared unto them.
